On cruisedeals, I would like to view the cruise schedules for a four-night trip from New York to Canada.

Open App: CruiseDeals
Click on button with the text "4 - 6 Nights"
Scroll down

My brother and I will be visiting Rio de Janeiro the following month. For two persons travelling to Rio de Janeiro from November 10 to November 15, I'll look for lodging on hotels.com.

Open App: Hotels.com
Click on button with the text "Destination, property or address"
Type text: Rio de Janeiro
Click on button with the text "Rio de Janeiro"
Click on point (539,525)
Click on button with the text "3"
Click on button with the text "15"
Click on button with the text "Done"
Click on button with the text "Search"
Wait for response
Check status: successful

I'm going to Cotswolds with my sister, so I'm searching for a hotel in Cotswolds for four nights from November 1st to November 5th, 2023, in the AirBnB app.

Open App: Airbnb
Click on button with the function of "New Delhi, India, $21 per night, button. "
Click on button with the function of "Location picker, Step 1 of 3"
Type text: Cotswolds
Click on button with the text "Cotswolds, United Kingdom"
Wait for response
Click on button with the text "1"
Click on button with the text "5"
Click on button with the text "Next"
Click on button with the text "Search"
Check status: successful

In the Sygic Travel app, I need to plan the Itinerary for the first 3 days from Jan. 24, 2024 so I want to add a place named Hanauma Beach for Day 1, Lolani Palace for Day 2 and Waikiki Beach for Day 3.

Go back to the previous page
Click on button with the text "Itinerary Jan 24 â€“ Jan 26"
Click on point (273,517)
Click on point (964,2216)
Click on button with the function of "Place"
Click on button with the text "Hanauma Beach"
Click on button with the text "Add to trip"
Click on button with the text "24"
Go back to the previous page
Go back to the previous page
Go back to the previous page
Go back to the previous page
Click on button with the text "Thursday"
Click on point (964,2212)
Click on button with the function of "Place"
Click on button with the text "Iolani Palace"
Click on button with the text "Add to trip"
Click on button with the text "25"
Go back to the previous page
Go back to the previous page
Go back to the previous page
Go back to the previous page
Click on button with the text "Friday"
Click on point (973,2228)
Click on button with the function of "Place"
Wait for response
Click on button with the text "Waikiki Beach"
Click on button with the text "Add to trip"
Click on button with the text "26"
Check status: successful
